aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content1: We are a family-owned company with over 9-yearsâ€™ of experience in food industry. We are manufacturing bread proofing baskets from natural rattan material, without any chemicals or bleaches.
aboutUs.content2: Every our product is handmade, with the utmost care. Paying great attention to the production process, we can ensure very high quality of our products.
